Oct. 2, 2010 D West Wales BBA Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best Instrumentalist: Bleddyn Roberts (Crwbin) Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £125, 3rd £100. 6 bands competed.
Oct. 5, 2010, 7:47 a.m. July 4, 2020, 11:53 a.m.
